thread.title: Affordable rentals for Portlanders displaced by gentrification to rise along MLK
thread.title_full: Affordable rentals for Portlanders displaced by gentrification to rise along MLK

author: Jessica Floum | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Affordable rentals for Portlanders displaced by gentrification to rise along MLK
text: In 1932, a female African American attorney in Portland ran for state office. Though Beatrice Morrow lost, her decision to run for office when African-Americans were not allowed to vote made her a "hidden hero," said Maxine Fitzpatrick, executive director of an African American-led Portland housing development group.
